build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl python3 python3-pip && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_22.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput

deploy.startCommand: cd backend && python3 manage.py migrate && gunicorn config.wsgi:application
